title: Kryptowerk
author: Kryptowerk
created_time: December 24, 2022, 06:13:57 PMLast edit: December 24, 2022, 09:40:04 PM by Kryptowerk
content: F ¬†U ¬†L ¬†L________________________________________________Christmas Raffle - Fast Forward Edition: Crypto Cosmos üéÑ  One prize:Crypto Cosmos Card deck in original foil (36 cards + 1x certificate) #246Terms- Account must have positive trade feedback or must be an established Hero / Legendary account (no negative trading feedback!)- I'll take the right to exclude anyone at my own discretion (will only do so with good reasoning: rude behaviour, obvious spamming etc.)- No multis - are going to be excluded from this and any raffles in the future.- If the prize is lost in transit, there will be no replacement- Shipping will be included worldwide (untracked)!- Minimum of 24 received merit!How to participate?Just pick any available number between 1 - 24! Please post in the following format: "YOUR NUMBER/SPOT - YOUR USERNAME"Once full, I'll pick a Bitcoin block that has not been mined yet. The last numbers of the block hash will determine the winner. If no winning number, next block will roll and so on...Slots:01 - YodasRedRocket02 - bitbollo03 - Thiago007 04 - tweetious05 - Suzuki Matt 06 - 07 - QuakerBull08 - Buchi-8809 - Markzellers10 - sunny11 - Dernoste12 - bestcoin_5913 - 14 - PeakDK15 - krogoth16 - henkcryptotank 17 - haloxon18 - 19 - 20 - JanEmil 21 - hookzup 22 - pinky1234 23 - PreciousMetapsICT24 - Jambo USAgl & hf!FAST FORWARD SPECIAL:Every 2 blocks I will close one free spot until the remaining slots are all filled.https://blockstream.info/Starting block: 768757Winning block: tba

comments.author: Mauser
comments.body: Thank you very much Kryptowerk for the cool raffle on Christmas, the cards look awesome. Going with the lucky number 13 this time:13 - MauserGood Luck to All and Merry Christmas!

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Nice, this seems to fill up quickly and we are probably set to roll soon.Blockchain is moving slowly, 1st spot was now closed due to the fast-forward rules (see OP).Next spot will be deleted when block 768761 rolls. Unless we are full before that.https://blockstream.info/Edit: And suddenly blockchain in turbo mode - one more slot deleted.Next delete with block 768763
